summary:
This Track, It's For You
Introduction: Get an IPhone trick ass
Part 1
Idol!Yoongi x Idol!Reader crack smau
Yoongi just wanted as...
body:
This Track, It’s For You

Introduction: Get an IPhone trick ass

Part 1

Idol!Yoongi x Idol!Reader crack smau

Yoongi just wanted as much peace as he could get with living the idol life and so far he had done a pretty good job at doing exactly that. But when he gets tangled in the feathers of Dove, an outgoing soul, he can’t help but feel he’s judged the world like a glass half empty…

summary: I remember when I first heard about BTS a couple of weeks after the IDOL comeback and I was like “Ok, they’re good but, c’mon!...
question: I remember when I first heard about BTS a couple of weeks after the IDOL comeback and I was like “Ok, they’re good but, c’mon! This girls are way too hyped up for them” Let’s all laugh together my ARMY fellas HA HA HA! Little did I know I was gonna be hiding in the bathroom in my job making an INHUMAN effort to refrain my fangirl screaming and being a zombie because that Dionysus stage killed me X_X
answer: Never laugh at something, you might become it.

trail.content_raw: Never laugh at something, you might become it.
trail.content: Never laugh at something, you might become it.

summary: There are really fans out here that are dedicated fandom members. I’m sorry, I just couldn’t do it. I love BTS and consider...
body: There are really fans out here that are dedicated fandom members. I’m sorry, I just couldn’t do it. I love BTS and consider myself to be apart of the BTS Army, but the rest of ya’ll are not gonna try to get me to hate on Monsta X. I love me some Monsta X as well. I mean how can you not love them. Have you seen the video for HERO? Or the video for Play It Cool? They are amazing. I guess I’m a multi fandom person. Also, If one of my favorite groups comes out with a song I don’t care for, I’m not gonna act like I like it. This new Blackpink song is terrible to me. The lyrics and beat are just all over the place. It’s just a mess to me and I can’t vibe or dance to it.

reblog.comment: There are really fans out here that are dedicated fandom members. I’m sorry, I just couldn’t do it. I love BTS and consider myself to be apart of the BTS Army, but the rest of ya’ll are not gonna try to get me to hate on Monsta X. I love me some Monsta X as well. I mean how can you not love them. Have you seen the video for HERO? Or the video for Play It Cool? They are amazing. I guess I’m a multi fandom person. Also, If one of my favorite groups comes out with a song I don’t care for, I’m not gonna act like I like it. This new Blackpink song is terrible to me. The lyrics and beat are just all over the place. It’s just a mess to me and I can’t vibe or dance to it.

Have you seen the video for HERO? Or the video for Play It Cool? They are amazing. I guess I’m a multi fandom person. Also, If one of my favorite groups comes out with a song I don’t care for, I’m not gonna act like I like it. This new Blackpink song is terrible to me. The lyrics and beat are just all over the place. It’s just a mess to me and I can’t vibe or dance to it.

We only accept idols/celebrities currently working in the Korean entertainment industry. OPEN SINCE: APRIL 25, 2019

title: A Sky Full Of Stars
body:
gif by @suggamiin

Pairing: Yoongi x Reader

Genre: fluff

Warnings: none

Word Count: 813

The night sky is massive when there are no forests to break it up or city lights to dull it down. It goes on forever, stretching farther than you can see, engulfing the world in a glittering blanket of midnight blue. It’s funny—the night sky—how it’s always been there. It’s there every night when the sun goes down and stays till the sun rises again, yet still one can’t help but stare up at it in astonishment as if staring at it for a thousand years still isn’t enough time to truly take it all in. It’s the disarray of the stars that makes it all so beautiful. A magnificent chaos as if God himself took the stars in his hand and randomly tossed them across the sky, saying “Here, go wherever you please.”

In the daylight, it’s easy to forget the enormity of the sky, of the universe surrounding your meager little planet. The light blue and the fluffy clouds seem more like the ceiling of a large room, hiding what’s beyond. You feel more enclosed, like there’s less space to fill and therefore you’re bigger, more significant. But in the night time, it couldn’t be more obvious just how small you are, and just how big it is. You see only what’s beyond. There’s something about the blackness, about the distance between you and the stars blinking back. Something ancient, something forever out of reach. Yes, the night sky is massive.

And while the size should be terrifying. While it should scare you to think that these stars are and will forever be out of reach and are giant in comparison even to your big world, it brings with it more a sense of calm than anything else. It puts everything into perspective and focus. It clears the mind. It’s comforting to know that the darker it gets, the more stars begin to shine and that they’ll always be there.

Even now, laying in this field, the boy you love lying next to you, the grass beneath you cold and a bit damp but still soft, tethering you down to the world, you look up at the stars in awe, at the swirling constellations and wish you were able to be among them. If only to reach out and touch them. Or to know what it’s like to be somehow outside of this life. An ethereal spectator.

“Yoongi, look,” you utter pointing up at a particularly bright, red tinged light. “I think that’s Mars.”

“Hmm?”

You turn your head, your eyes landing on the sleepy, half-lidded face of your boyfriend. You nudge him. “Yoongi, you’re supposed to be stargazing with me.”

“You can’t bring me out here in the dark and expect me not to get sleepy,” he slurs and brings his arm back to rest behind his head.

“Are you ever not sleepy?” you ask nuzzling closer so your lips rest against his shoulder.

“Hmm?” he hums again and you chuckle.

“Just look at the stars with me for a second. Please Yoongi?”

The boy groans and shifts, bringing his arm back from behind his head again to fold with the other across his stomach. “Alright, alright,” he says. “What are we looking at?”

“The universe,” you breathe. “At the billions of other worlds, maybe like our own with people living their own lives. Maybe looking at the night sky back at us.”

“But probably not.”

You let out a scoff. “You’re always so cynical,” you say.

Yoongi reaches over to grasp your hand, intertwining your fingers and pulling them back home to his chest. “No, I get it,” he says. “I can understand the thrill of stargazing.”

“Really? You?”

“Sure,” he utters and you watch his Adam’s apple bob in his pale throat as he thinks. “But I don’t need to look up at the sky to see the stars.” Then he lets his head fall to the side. “I see them when I look at you.”

“Oof,” you say with a giggle. “Cheesy much?”

“Maybe, but I don’t feel the need to go searching for beautiful things when I have the most beautiful one right here,” he says and squeezes your hand where it rests against his ribs.

Shoot. The boy’s a lyricist. Of course he can make your heart flutter with just the turn of a phrase. You roll over now so you’re leaning down over him and you watch his dark eyes flick up to meet yours. The moon and stars reflect so perfectly in them. As if his eyes hold galaxies of their own within.

“You’re right,” you finally say. “I don’t need a sky full of stars either when I have the brightest one right here.”

Yoongi’s mouth turns up into a lazy grin. “Now who’s being cheesy?” he asks before bringing his hand up and tangling his fingers into your hair so he can pull you down to him.

Yoongi reaches over to grasp your hand, intertwining your fingers and pulling them back home to his chest. “No, I get it,” he says. “I can understand the thrill of stargazing.”

“Really? You?”

“Sure,” he utters and you watch his Adam’s apple bob in his pale throat as he thinks. “But I don’t need to look up at the sky to see the stars.” Then he lets his head fall to the side. “I see them when I look at you.”

“Oof,” you say with a giggle. “Cheesy much?”

“Maybe, but I don’t feel the need to go searching for beautiful things when I have the most beautiful one right here,” he says and squeezes your hand where it rests against his ribs.

Shoot. The boy’s a lyricist. Of course he can make your heart flutter with just the turn of a phrase. You roll over now so you’re leaning down over him and you watch his dark eyes flick up to meet yours. The moon and stars reflect so perfectly in them. As if his eyes hold galaxies of their own within.

“You’re right,” you finally say. “I don’t need a sky full of stars either when I have the brightest one right here.”

Yoongi’s mouth turns up into a lazy grin. “Now who’s being cheesy?” he asks before bringing his hand up and tangling his fingers into your hair so he can pull you down to him.
trail.content:
gif by @suggamiin

Pairing: Yoongi x Reader

Genre: fluff

Warnings: none

Word Count: 813

The night sky is massive when there are no forests to break it up or city lights to dull it down. It goes on forever, stretching farther than you can see, engulfing the world in a glittering blanket of midnight blue. It’s funny—the night sky—how it’s always been there. It’s there every night when the sun goes down and stays till the sun rises again, yet still one can’t help but stare up at it in astonishment as if staring at it for a thousand years still isn’t enough time to truly take it all in. It’s the disarray of the stars that makes it all so beautiful. A magnificent chaos as if God himself took the stars in his hand and randomly tossed them across the sky, saying “Here, go wherever you please.”

In the daylight, it’s easy to forget the enormity of the sky, of the universe surrounding your meager little planet. The light blue and the fluffy clouds seem more like the ceiling of a large room, hiding what’s beyond. You feel more enclosed, like there’s less space to fill and therefore you’re bigger, more significant. But in the night time, it couldn’t be more obvious just how small you are, and just how big it is. You see only what’s beyond. There’s something about the blackness, about the distance between you and the stars blinking back. Something ancient, something forever out of reach. Yes, the night sky is massive.

And while the size should be terrifying. While it should scare you to think that these stars are and will forever be out of reach and are giant in comparison even to your big world, it brings with it more a sense of calm than anything else. It puts everything into perspective and focus. It clears the mind. It’s comforting to know that the darker it gets, the more stars begin to shine and that they’ll always be there.

Even now, laying in this field, the boy you love lying next to you, the grass beneath you cold and a bit damp but still soft, tethering you down to the world, you look up at the stars in awe, at the swirling constellations and wish you were able to be among them. If only to reach out and touch them. Or to know what it’s like to be somehow outside of this life. An ethereal spectator.

“Yoongi, look,” you utter pointing up at a particularly bright, red tinged light. “I think that’s Mars.”

“Hmm?”

You turn your head, your eyes landing on the sleepy, half-lidded face of your boyfriend. You nudge him. “Yoongi, you’re supposed to be stargazing with me.”

“You can’t bring me out here in the dark and expect me not to get sleepy,” he slurs and brings his arm back to rest behind his head.

“Are you ever not sleepy?” you ask nuzzling closer so your lips rest against his shoulder.

“Hmm?” he hums again and you chuckle.

“Just look at the stars with me for a second. Please Yoongi?”

The boy groans and shifts, bringing his arm back from behind his head again to fold with the other across his stomach. “Alright, alright,” he says. “What are we looking at?”

“The universe,” you breathe. “At the billions of other worlds, maybe like our own with people living their own lives. Maybe looking at the night sky back at us.”

“But probably not.”

You let out a scoff. “You’re always so cynical,” you say.

Yoongi reaches over to grasp your hand, intertwining your fingers and pulling them back home to his chest. “No, I get it,” he says. “I can understand the thrill of stargazing.”

“Really? You?”

“Sure,” he utters and you watch his Adam’s apple bob in his pale throat as he thinks. “But I don’t need to look up at the sky to see the stars.” Then he lets his head fall to the side. “I see them when I look at you.”

“Oof,” you say with a giggle. “Cheesy much?”

“Maybe, but I don’t feel the need to go searching for beautiful things when I have the most beautiful one right here,” he says and squeezes your hand where it rests against his ribs.

Shoot. The boy’s a lyricist. Of course he can make your heart flutter with just the turn of a phrase. You roll over now so you’re leaning down over him and you watch his dark eyes flick up to meet yours. The moon and stars reflect so perfectly in them. As if his eyes hold galaxies of their own within.

“You’re right,” you finally say. “I don’t need a sky full of stars either when I have the brightest one right here.”

Yoongi’s mouth turns up into a lazy grin. “Now who’s being cheesy?” he asks before bringing his hand up and tangling his fingers into your hair so he can pull you down to him.

blog.name: allforbts
blog.title: ALL FOR BTS
blog.description: Welcome to ALLFORBTS! This blog is dedicated to posting photos, videos, translations, information, news, and other updates for all seven members of 방탄소년단 (also known as BTS, Bangtan, Bangtan Boys).

body:
5 Unpopular K-Pop Opinions

Okay so before you read this and start telling me that I’m stupid. Or you get offend these are my OPINIONS.

1. Wings and The Most Beautiful Moment in Life (all) are some of the Best BTS albums.

okay so we starting off with a big one. Y’all know I’m a BTS Stan and I will always love Bts but, The LY Albums aren’t some of their best work. Now don’t get me wrong Taehyung’s Singularity and Magic Shop are bops but, I think that these albums and all the ones before are highly underrated. These albums holds Blood Sweat & Tear and House of Cards. I do think that TMBMIL: Young Forever is just amazing. REMEMBER This is just a an Opinion.

2. 2NE1 is better than Black Pink and Red Velvet

Now look. Black Pink and Red Velvet have the potential to be as good as 2NE1 but, they are not and aren’t going to be anytime soon. Unless they can give us something *instert Lady Gaga rambling vine*. Also I’m still very pissed over 2NE1s disbandment. Thank You for coming to my Ted Talk.

3. Hyuna and E’Dawn

Okay one it was all wayyyyyy to obvious. We should’ve been known. However, I do think they way that Cube handled that made me upset. Like bitch they can date whoever they want but, when Cube came out and said that they couldn’t trust Hyuna I understood. Hyuna did just let them out without the knowledge of Cube. I’m not implying that they need to be forced to obey Cube slaves but, I think it would’ve been better if the told Cube before hand. However neither of them deserved what they got. Just saying.

4. We do not know BTS. (also they might all lowkey be depressed.)

All right. This is something I’ve been noticing for a while now. I think BTS fakes a lot of stuff when the camera is turned on. Now don’t get me wrong I don’t think that they don’t enjoy how far they have come but, I do think that Big Hit hold thems on a tight leash. BTS is the face of K-pop and have been since Fake Love and DNA made it big. I do believe that their personalities on camera are somewhat similar to who they are but, I think they have to hide a lot. Hoseok even said he wish didn’t have to as happy as he is on cameras. Also when Jin got on the mic at Mama 2018 and said they thought about disbanding earlier in 2018 because of their mental health issues it just made me realize that we really don’t see them as people and we need to. BTS never takes a break andI think if we don’t tell them or get them to take a break than we’ll be facing disbandment. (also i don’t know if y’all noticed but, Tae has looked really sad lately.)

5. We all need to stop judging K-Pop idols because we may not like something.

Okay so look. THIS IS A HUGE FUCKING ISSUE. Wendy’s weight lost. Taehyungs mullet. I seriously can’t stand when k-pop fans can’t be happy with new looks or new music or what they wear. It seriously pisses me off. If you don’t like…oh well. Also, if you ship members (male x male or female x female) but, hate when there are gay or lesbian k-pop idols than SmD. I’m sorry I got really mad but, look this is a serious issue in K-pop.

all right i’m done for now. Go and say what you want and also i’m still like half asleep so any grammar and spelling errors i’m sorry for. Also drop your unpopular opinions.
